page.title: 17A Day in the Life
page.content:
I am nine years old and I am called Claire Dunstan. On a typical day I wake at 7:15 a.m. I get dressed and then I feed the animals. Afterwards I eat my cereal and toast. I then clean my teeth and brush my hair. My friend calls for me and we go to school, by car. First we go to the playground and we play tig. When the whistle goes, we go indoors and do English. Then we have another playtime and we go in to do Maths. Sometimes we have Music. At 12:15 we have our lunch and in the afternoon we usually do Social Studies, Art or Games. Then we go home at 3:20. I usually do sport before tea. Later I do my homework, then watch telly until 9:00 p.m. when I go to bed.
(Claire Dunstan)
